title: Umbrella/excess liability policies
dataVerified: Policyholder name, underlying policies, excess coverage limits, premium, effective dates
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/cancelled). Link to insurer system (policyholders and claimants, requires authentication)
rationale: Domain binding verifies insurer. High-value coverage ($1M-$5M typical). Prevents fake umbrella policies in contractor fraud and asset protection fraud. Verifies underlying coverage requirements are met. Critical for high-net-worth individuals where umbrella policy verification protects against catastrophic liability.
